name: Christos Papadopoulos
content: Christos Papadopoulos - Computer Science - The University of Memphis Skip to main content SearchX Safety & Security Prospective Students Current Students Parents & Family Alumni Veterans Faculty & Staff People Take Action Follow Us Online FacebookLinkedIn Home Computer Science People Faculty Pages Christos Papadopoulos Christos Papadopoulos Professor and Sparks Family Chair of Excellence in Global Research Leadership Phone Email Christos.Papadopoulos@memphis.edu Fax 901.678.1506 Office Dunn Hall 137 Office Hours Call for hours Degree: DSc, Computer Science, Washington University in St. Louis, 1999 Research Interests:Computer networks, network security, multimedia communication, distributed systems Google Scholar Dr. Papadopoulos joined the Computer Science Department in Fall 2020. Prior to joining, he was a Professor of Computer Science at Colorado State University.
